00012 char La_norm_type(const char *typstr)
00013 {
00014     char typup;
00015 
00016     if (strlen(typstr) != 1)
00017         error(
00018             _("argument type[1]='%s' must be a character string of string length 1"),
00019             typstr);
00020     typup = toupper(*typstr);
00021     if (typup == '1')
00022         typup = 'O'; /* aliases */
00023     else if (typup == 'E')
00024         typup = 'F';
00025     else if (typup != 'M' && typup != 'O' && typup != 'I' && typup != 'F')
00026         error(_("argument type[1]='%s' must be one of 'M','1','O','I','F' or 'E'"),
00027               typstr);
00028     return typup;
00029 }
00030 
00031 char La_rcond_type(const char *typstr)
00032 {
00033     char typup;
00034 
00035     if (strlen(typstr) != 1)
00036         error(_("argument type[1]='%s' must be a character string of string length 1"),
00037               typstr);
00038     typup = toupper(*typstr);
00039     if (typup == '1')
00040         typup = 'O'; /* alias */
00041     else if (typup != 'O' && typup != 'I')
00042         error(_("argument type[1]='%s' must be one of '1','O', or 'I'"),
00043               typstr);
00044     return typup;
00045 }

00048 double get_double_by_name(SEXP obj, char *nm)
00049 {
00050     SEXP nms = getAttrib(obj, R_NamesSymbol);
00051     int i, len = length(obj);
00052 
00053     if ((!isReal(obj)) || (length(obj) > 0 && nms == R_NilValue))
00054         error(_("object must be a named, numeric vector"));
00055     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00056         if (!strcmp(nm, CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i)))) {
00057             return REAL(obj)[i];
00058         }
00059     }
00060     return R_NaReal;
00061 }
00062 
00063 SEXP
00064 set_double_by_name(SEXP obj, double val, char *nm)
00065 {
00066     SEXP nms = getAttrib(obj, R_NamesSymbol);
00067     int i, len = length(obj);
00068 
00069     if ((!isReal(obj)) || (length(obj) > 0 && nms == R_NilValue))
00070         error("object must be a named, numeric vector");
00071     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00072         if (!strcmp(nm, CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i)))) {
00073             REAL(obj)[i] = val;
00074             return obj;
00075         }
00076     }
00077     {
00078         SEXP nx = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, len + 1)),
00079             nnms = allocVector(STRSXP, len + 1);
00080 
00081         setAttrib(nx, R_NamesSymbol, nnms);
00082         for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00083             REAL(nx)[i] = REAL(obj)[i];
00084             SET_STRING_ELT(nnms, i, duplicate(STRING_ELT(nms, i)));
00085         }
00086         REAL(nx)[len] = val;
00087         SET_STRING_ELT(nnms, len, mkChar(nm));
00088         UNPROTECT(1);
00089         return nx;
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 SEXP as_det_obj(double val, int log, int sign)
00094 {
00095     SEXP det = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, 2)),
00096         nms = allocVector(STRSXP, 2),
00097         vv = ScalarReal(val);
00098 
00099     setAttrib(det, R_NamesSymbol, nms);
00100     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 0, mkChar("modulus"));
00101     SET_STRING_ELT(nms, 1, mkChar("sign"));
00102     setAttrib(vv, install("logarithm"), ScalarLogical(log));
00103     SET_VECTOR_ELT(det, 0, vv);
00104     SET_VECTOR_ELT(det, 1, ScalarInteger(sign));
00105     setAttrib(det, R_ClassSymbol, mkString("det"));
00106     UNPROTECT(1);
00107     return det;
00108 }

00110 SEXP get_factors(SEXP obj, char *nm)
00111 {
00112     SEXP fac = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_factorSym),
00113         nms = getAttrib(fac, R_NamesSymbol);
00114     int i, len = length(fac);
00115 
00116     if ((!isNewList(fac)) || (length(fac) > 0 && nms == R_NilValue))
00117         error("factors slot must be a named list");
00118     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00119         if (!strcmp(nm, CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i)))) {
00120             return VECTOR_ELT(fac, i);
00121         }
00122     }
00123     return R_NilValue;
00124 }
00125 
00126 SEXP set_factors(SEXP obj, SEXP val, char *nm)
00127 {
00128     SEXP fac = GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_factorSym),
00129         nms = getAttrib(fac, R_NamesSymbol), nfac, nnms;
00130     int i, len = length(fac);
00131 
00132     if ((!isNewList(fac)) || (length(fac) > 0 && nms == R_NilValue))
00133         error("factors slot must be a named list");
00134     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00135         if (!strcmp(nm, CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i)))) {
00136             SET_VECTOR_ELT(fac, i, duplicate(val));
00137             return val;
00138         }
00139     }
00140     nfac = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, len + 1));
00141     nnms = PROTECT(allocVector(STRSXP, len + 1));
00142     setAttrib(nfac, R_NamesSymbol, nnms);
00143     for (i = 0; i < len; i++) {
00144         SET_VECTOR_ELT(nfac, i, VECTOR_ELT(fac, i));
00145         SET_STRING_ELT(nnms, i, duplicate(STRING_ELT(nms, i)));
00146     }
00147     SET_VECTOR_ELT(nfac, len, duplicate(val));
00148     SET_STRING_ELT(nnms, len, mkChar(nm));
00149     SET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_factorSym, nfac);
00150     UNPROTECT(2);
00151     return val;
00152 }

00166 /* Fill in the "trivial remainder" in  n*m  array ;
00167  *  typically the 'x' slot of a "dtrMatrix" :
00168  * But should be usable for double/logical/int/complex : */
00169 
00170 #define MAKE_TRIANGULAR_BODY(_TO_, _FROM_, _ZERO_, _ONE_)       \
00171 {                                                               \
00172     int i, j, *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(_FROM_, Matrix_DimSym)); \
00173     int n = dims[0], m = dims[1];                               \
00174                                                                 \
00175     if (*uplo_P(_FROM_) == 'U') {                               \
00176         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)                                 \
00177             for (i = j+1; i < m; i++)                           \
00178                 _TO_[i + j*m] = _ZERO_;                         \
00179     } else {                                                    \
00180         for (j = 1; j < n; j++)                                 \
00181             for (i = 0; i < j && i < m; i++)                    \
00182                 _TO_[i + j*m] = _ZERO_;                         \
00183     }                                                           \
00184     if (*diag_P(_FROM_) == 'U') {                               \
00185         j = (n < m) ? n : m;                                    \
00186         for (i = 0; i < j; i++)                                 \
00187             _TO_[i * (m + 1)] = _ONE_;                          \
00188     }                                                           \
00189 }

00193 void make_i_matrix_triangular(int *to, SEXP from)

00197 /* Should work for double/logical/int/complex : */
00198 #define MAKE_SYMMETRIC_BODY(_TO_, _FROM_)                       \
00199 {                                                               \
00200     int i, j, n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(_FROM_, Matrix_DimSym))[0];  \
00201                                                                 \
00202     if (*uplo_P(_FROM_) == 'U') {                               \
00203         for (j = 0; j < n; j++)                                 \
00204             for (i = j+1; i < n; i++)                           \
00205                 _TO_[i + j*n] = _TO_[j + i*n];                  \
00206     } else {                                                    \
00207         for (j = 1; j < n; j++)                                 \
00208             for (i = 0; i < j && i < n; i++)                    \
00209                 _TO_[i + j*n] = _TO_[j + i*n];                  \
00210     }                                                           \
00211 }

00228 SEXP
00229 Matrix_make_named(int TYP, char **names)
00230 {
00231     SEXP ans, nms;
00232     int i, n;
00233 
00234     for (n = 0; strlen(names[n]) > 0; n++) {}
00235     ans = PROTECT(allocVector(TYP, n));
00236     nms = PROTECT(allocVector(STRSXP, n));
00237     for (i = 0; i < n; i++) SET_STRING_ELT(nms, i, mkChar(names[i]));
00238     setAttrib(ans, R_NamesSymbol, nms);
00239     UNPROTECT(2);
00240     return ans;
00241 }

00243 #define Matrix_Error_Bufsiz    4096
00244 
00245 SEXP check_scalar_string(SEXP sP, char *vals, char *nm)
00246 {
00247     SEXP val = ScalarLogical(1);
00248     char *buf;
00249     /* only allocate when needed: in good case, none is needed */
00250 #define SPRINTF buf = Alloca(Matrix_Error_Bufsiz, char); R_CheckStack(); sprintf
00251 
00252     if (length(sP) != 1) {
00253         SPRINTF(buf, _("'%s' slot must have length 1"), nm);
00254     } else {
00255         const char *str = CHAR(STRING_ELT(sP, 0));
00256         if (strlen(str) != 1) {
00257             SPRINTF(buf, _("'%s' must have string length 1"), nm);
00258         } else {
00259             int i, len, match;
00260             for (i = 0, len = strlen(vals), match = 0; i < len; i++) {
00261                 if (str[0] == vals[i])
00262                     return R_NilValue;
00263             }
00264             SPRINTF(buf, _("'%s' must be in '%s'"), nm, vals);
00265         }
00266     }
00267     /* 'error' returns : */
00268     val = mkString(buf);
00269     return val;
00270 #undef SPRINTF
00271 }
00272 
00273 /* FIXME? Something like this should be part of the R API ?
00274  *        But then, R has the more general  compute_identical()
00275  * in src/main/identical.c: Rboolean compute_identical(SEXP x, SEXP y);
00276 */
00277 Rboolean equal_string_vectors(SEXP s1, SEXP s2)
00278 {
00279     Rboolean n1 = isNull(s1), n2 = isNull(s2);
00280     if (n1 || n2)
00281         return (n1 == n2) ? TRUE : FALSE;
00282     else if (TYPEOF(s1) != STRSXP || TYPEOF(s2) != STRSXP) {
00283         error(_("'s1' and 's2' must be \"character\" vectors"));
00284         return FALSE; /* -Wall */
00285     } else {
00286         int n = LENGTH(s1), i;
00287         if (n != LENGTH(s2))
00288             return FALSE;
00289         for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00290             /* note that compute_identical() code for STRSXP
00291                is careful about NA's which we don't need */
00292             if(strcmp(CHAR(STRING_ELT(s1, i)),
00293                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(s2, i))))
00294                 return FALSE;
00295         }
00296         return TRUE; /* they *are* equal */
00297     }
00298 }

00300 
00301 SEXP dense_nonpacked_validate(SEXP obj)
00302 {
00303     int *dims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_DimSym));
00304     if ((dims[0] * dims[1]) != length(GET_SLOT(obj, Matrix_xSym)))
00305         return mkString(_("length of x slot != prod(Dim)"));
00306     return ScalarLogical(1);
00307 }

00309 
00310 #define PACKED_TO_FULL(TYPE)                                            \
00311 TYPE *packed_to_full_ ## TYPE(TYPE *dest, const TYPE *src,              \
00312                         int n, enum CBLAS_UPLO uplo)                    \
00313 {                                                                       \
00314     int i, j, pos = 0;                                                  \
00315                                                                         \
00316     AZERO(dest, n*n);                                                   \
00317     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {                                           \
00318         switch(uplo) {                                                  \
00319         case UPP:                                                       \
00320             for (i = 0; i <= j; i++) dest[i + j * n] = src[pos++];      \
00321             break;                                                      \
00322         case LOW:                                                       \
00323             for (i = j; i < n; i++) dest[i + j * n] = src[pos++];       \
00324             break;                                                      \
00325         default:                                                        \
00326             error(_("'uplo' must be UPP or LOW"));                      \
00327         }                                                               \
00328     }                                                                   \
00329     return dest;                                                        \
00330 }
00331 
00332 PACKED_TO_FULL(double)
00333 PACKED_TO_FULL(int)
00334 
00335 #define FULL_TO_PACKED(TYPE)                                            \
00336 TYPE *full_to_packed_ ## TYPE(TYPE *dest, const TYPE *src, int n,       \
00337                       enum CBLAS_UPLO uplo, enum CBLAS_DIAG diag)       \
00338 {                                                                       \
00339     int i, j, pos = 0;                                                  \
00340                                                                         \
00341     for (j = 0; j < n; j++) {                                           \
00342         switch(uplo) {                                                  \
00343         case UPP:                                                       \
00344             for (i = 0; i <= j; i++)                                    \
00345                 dest[pos++] = (i == j && diag== UNT) ? 1 : src[i + j*n]; \
00346             break;                                                      \
00347         case LOW:                                                       \
00348             for (i = j; i < n; i++)                                     \
00349                 dest[pos++] = (i == j && diag== UNT) ? 1 : src[i + j*n]; \
00350             break;                                                      \
00351         default:                                                        \
00352             error(_("'uplo' must be UPP or LOW"));                      \
00353         }                                                               \
00354     }                                                                   \
00355     return dest;                                                        \
00356 }

00372 void d_packed_getDiag(double *dest, SEXP x, int n)
00373 {
00374     double *xx = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00375 
00376 #define END_packed_getDiag                                              \
00377     int j, pos = 0;                                                     \
00378                                                                         \
00379     if (*uplo_P(x) == 'U') {                                            \
00380         for(pos= 0, j=0; j < n; pos += 1+(++j))  dest[j] = xx[pos];     \
00381     } else {                                                            \
00382         for(pos= 0, j=0; j < n; pos += (n - j), j++) dest[j] = xx[pos]; \
00383     }                                                                   \
00384     return
00385 
00386     END_packed_getDiag;
00387 }
00388 
00389 void l_packed_getDiag(int *dest, SEXP x, int n)
00390 {
00391     int *xx = LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_xSym));
00392 
00393     END_packed_getDiag;
00394 }
00395 
00396 #undef END_packed_getDiag

00398 void tr_d_packed_getDiag(double *dest, SEXP x)
00399 {
00400     int n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym))[0];
00401     SEXP val = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
00402     double *v = REAL(val);
00403 
00404     if (*diag_P(x) == 'U') {
00405         int j;
00406         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) v[j] = 1.;
00407     } else {
00408         d_packed_getDiag(v, x, n);
00409     }
00410     UNPROTECT(1);
00411     return;
00412 }
00413 
00414 void tr_l_packed_getDiag(   int *dest, SEXP x)
00415 {
00416     int n = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimSym))[0];
00417     SEXP val = PROTECT(allocVector(LGLSXP, n));
00418     int *v = LOGICAL(val);
00419 
00420     if (*diag_P(x) == 'U') {
00421         int j;
00422         for (j = 0; j < n; j++) v[j] = 1;
00423     } else {
00424         l_packed_getDiag(v, x, n);
00425     }
00426     UNPROTECT(1);
00427     return;
00428 }

00430 SEXP Matrix_expand_pointers(SEXP pP)
00431 {
00432     int n = length(pP) - 1;
00433     int *p = INTEGER(pP);
00434     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, p[n]));
00435 
00436     expand_cmprPt(n, p, INTEGER(ans));
00437     UNPROTECT(1);
00438     return ans;
00439 }

00450 SEXP
00451 Matrix_getElement(SEXP list, char *nm) {
00452     SEXP names = getAttrib(list, R_NamesSymbol);
00453     int i;
00454 
00455     for (i = 0; i < LENGTH(names); i++)
00456         if (!strcmp(CHAR(STRING_ELT(names, i)), nm))
00457             return(VECTOR_ELT(list, i));
00458     return R_NilValue;
00459 }
00460 
00469 static double *
00470 install_diagonal(double *dest, SEXP A)
00471 {
00472     int nc = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_DimSym))[0];
00473     int i, ncp1 = nc + 1, unit = *diag_P(A) == 'U';
00474     double *ax = REAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym));
00475 
00476     AZERO(dest, nc * nc);
00477     for (i = 0; i < nc; i++)
00478         dest[i * ncp1] = (unit) ? 1. : ax[i];
00479     return dest;
00480 }
00481 
00482 static int *
00483 install_diagonal_int(int *dest, SEXP A)
00484 {
00485     int nc = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_DimSym))[0];
00486     int i, ncp1 = nc + 1, unit = *diag_P(A) == 'U';
00487     int *ax = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym));
00488 
00489     AZERO(dest, nc * nc);
00490     for (i = 0; i < nc; i++)
00491         dest[i * ncp1] = (unit) ? 1 : ax[i];
00492     return dest;
00493 }

00495 
00503 /* NOTA BENE: If you enlarge this list, do change '14' and '6' below !
00504  * ---------  ddiMatrix & ldiMatrix  are no longer ddense or ldense on the R level,
00505  *            ---         ---        but are still dealt with here.
00506  */
00507 
00508 #define ddense_CLASSES                                                  \
00509                     "dgeMatrix", "dtrMatrix",                           \
00510                     "dsyMatrix", "dpoMatrix", "ddiMatrix",              \
00511                     "dtpMatrix", "dspMatrix", "dppMatrix",              \
00512                     /* sub classes of those above:*/                    \
00513                     /* dtr */ "Cholesky", "LDL", "BunchKaufman",        \
00514                     /* dtp */ "pCholesky", "pBunchKaufman",             \
00515                     /* dpo */ "corMatrix"
00516 
00517 #define ldense_CLASSES                                  \
00518                     "lgeMatrix", "ltrMatrix",           \
00519                     "lsyMatrix", "ldiMatrix",           \
00520                     "ltpMatrix", "lspMatrix"
00521 
00522 #define ndense_CLASSES                                  \
00523                     "ngeMatrix", "ntrMatrix",           \
00524                     "nsyMatrix",                        \
00525                     "ntpMatrix", "nspMatrix"
00526 
00527 /* Generalized -- "geMatrix" -- dispatch where needed : */
00528 SEXP dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix(SEXP A)
00529 {
00530     SEXP ans, ad = R_NilValue, an = R_NilValue; /* -Wall */
00531     const char *cl = class_P(A);
00532     char *valid[] = {"_NOT_A_CLASS_",/* *_CLASSES defined in ./Mutils.h */
00533                     ddense_CLASSES, /* 14 */
00534                     ldense_CLASSES, /* 6  */
00535                     ndense_CLASSES, /* 5  */
00536                     ""};
00537     int sz, ctype = Matrix_check_class(cl, valid), nprot = 1;
00538     enum dense_enum { ddense, ldense, ndense } M_type = ddense /* -Wall */;
00539 
00540     if (ctype > 0) { /* a [nld]denseMatrix object */
00541         ad = GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_DimSym);
00542         an = GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00543         M_type = (ctype <= 14) ? ddense :
00544             ((ctype <= 14+6) ? ldense : ndense);
00545     }
00546     else if (ctype < 0) {       /* not a (recognized) classed matrix */
00547 
00548         if (isReal(A))
00549             M_type = ddense;
00550         else if (isInteger(A)) {
00551             A = PROTECT(coerceVector(A, REALSXP));
00552             nprot++;
00553             M_type = ddense;
00554         }
00555         else if (isLogical(A))
00556             M_type = ldense;
00557         else
00558             error(_("invalid class '%s' to dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix"), cl);
00559 
00560 #define DUP_MMATRIX_NON_CLASS                                           \
00561         if (isMatrix(A)) {      /* "matrix" */                          \
00562             ad = getAttrib(A, R_DimSymbol);                             \
00563             an = getAttrib(A, R_DimNamesSymbol);                        \
00564         } else {/* maybe "numeric" (incl integer,logical) --> (n x 1) */\
00565             int* dd = INTEGER(ad = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, 2)));    \
00566             nprot++;                                                    \
00567             dd[0] = LENGTH(A);                                          \
00568             dd[1] = 1;                                                  \
00569             an = R_NilValue;                                            \
00570         }                                                               \
00571         ctype = 0
00572 
00573         DUP_MMATRIX_NON_CLASS;
00574     }
00575 
00576     ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS(M_type == ddense ? "dgeMatrix" :
00577                                         (M_type == ldense ? "lgeMatrix" :
00578                                          "ngeMatrix"))));
00579 #define DUP_MMATRIX_SET_1                                       \
00580     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, duplicate(ad));                \
00581     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, (LENGTH(an) == 2) ?       \
00582              duplicate(an): allocVector(VECSXP, 2));            \
00583     sz = INTEGER(ad)[0] * INTEGER(ad)[1]
00584 
00585     DUP_MMATRIX_SET_1;
00586 
00587     if(M_type == ddense) { /* ddense -> dge */
00588 
00589         double *ansx;
00590 
00591 #define DUP_MMATRIX_ddense_CASES                                                \
00592         ansx = REAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, sz));                 \
00593         switch(ctype) {                                                         \
00594         case 0:                 /* unclassed real matrix */                     \
00595             Memcpy(ansx, REAL(A), sz);                                          \
00596             break;                                                              \
00597         case 1:                 /* dgeMatrix */                                 \
00598             Memcpy(ansx, REAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)), sz);                   \
00599             break;                                                              \
00600         case 2:                 /* dtrMatrix   and subclasses */                \
00601         case 9: case 10: case 11:   /* ---      Cholesky, LDL, BunchKaufman */  \
00602             Memcpy(ansx, REAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)), sz);                   \
00603             make_d_matrix_triangular(ansx, A);                                  \
00604             break;                                                              \
00605         case 3:                 /* dsyMatrix */                                 \
00606         case 4:                 /* dpoMatrix  + subclass */                     \
00607         case 14:                        /* ---  corMatrix */                    \
00608             Memcpy(ansx, REAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)), sz);                   \
00609             make_d_matrix_symmetric(ansx, A);                                   \
00610             break;                                                              \
00611         case 5:                 /* ddiMatrix */                                 \
00612             install_diagonal(ansx, A);                                          \
00613             break;                                                              \
00614         case 6:                 /* dtpMatrix  + subclasses */                   \
00615         case 12: case 13:               /* ---  pCholesky, pBunchKaufman */     \
00616             packed_to_full_double(ansx, REAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)),         \
00617                                   INTEGER(ad)[0],                               \
00618                                   *uplo_P(A) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);               \
00619             make_d_matrix_triangular(ansx, A);                                  \
00620             break;                                                              \
00621         case 7:                 /* dspMatrix */                                 \
00622         case 8:                 /* dppMatrix */                                 \
00623             packed_to_full_double(ansx, REAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)),         \
00624                                   INTEGER(ad)[0],                               \
00625                                   *uplo_P(A) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);               \
00626             make_d_matrix_symmetric(ansx, A);                                   \
00627             break;                                                              \
00628         }  /* switch(ctype) */
00629 
00630         DUP_MMATRIX_ddense_CASES
00631 
00632     }
00633     else { /* M_type == ldense || M_type = ndense  */
00634         /* ldense -> lge */
00635         /* ndense -> nge */
00636         int *ansx = LOGICAL(ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, LGLSXP, sz));
00637 
00638         switch(ctype) {
00639         case 0:                 /* unclassed logical matrix */
00640             Memcpy(ansx, LOGICAL(A), sz);
00641             break;
00642 
00643         case 1+14:                      /* lgeMatrix */
00644         case 1+14+6:                    /* ngeMatrix */
00645             Memcpy(ansx, LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)), sz);
00646             break;
00647         case 2+14:                      /* ltrMatrix */
00648         case 2+14+6:                    /* ntrMatrix */
00649             Memcpy(ansx, LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)), sz);
00650             make_i_matrix_triangular(ansx, A);
00651             break;
00652         case 3+14:                      /* lsyMatrix */
00653         case 3+14+6:                    /* nsyMatrix */
00654             Memcpy(ansx, LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)), sz);
00655             make_i_matrix_symmetric(ansx, A);
00656             break;
00657         case 4+14:                      /* ldiMatrix */
00658         case 4+14+6:                    /* ndiMatrix */
00659             install_diagonal_int(ansx, A);
00660             break;
00661         case 5+14:                      /* ltpMatrix */
00662         case 5+14+6:                    /* ntpMatrix */
00663             packed_to_full_int(ansx, LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)),
00664                                INTEGER(ad)[0],
00665                                *uplo_P(A) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);
00666             make_i_matrix_triangular(ansx, A);
00667             break;
00668         case 6+14:                      /* lspMatrix */
00669         case 6+14+6:                    /* nspMatrix */
00670             packed_to_full_int(ansx, LOGICAL(GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_xSym)),
00671                                INTEGER(ad)[0],
00672                                *uplo_P(A) == 'U' ? UPP : LOW);
00673             make_i_matrix_symmetric(ansx, A);
00674             break;
00675 
00676         default:
00677             error(_("unexpected ctype = %d in dup_mMatrix_as_geMatrix"), ctype);
00678         }  /* switch(ctype) */
00679 
00680     }  /* if(M_type == .) */
00681 
00682     UNPROTECT(nprot);
00683     return ans;
00684 }
00685 
00686 SEXP dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(SEXP A)
00687 {
00688     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix"))),
00689         ad = R_NilValue , an = R_NilValue;      /* -Wall */
00690     const char *cl = class_P(A);
00691     char *valid[] = {"_NOT_A_CLASS_", ddense_CLASSES, ""};
00692     int ctype = Matrix_check_class(cl, valid), nprot = 1, sz;
00693     double *ansx;
00694 
00695     if (ctype > 0) {            /* a ddenseMatrix object */
00696         ad = GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_DimSym);
00697         an = GET_SLOT(A, Matrix_DimNamesSym);
00698     }
00699     else if (ctype < 0) {       /* not a (recognized) classed matrix */
00700 
00701         DUP_MMATRIX_NON_CLASS;
00702 
00703         if (isInteger(A) || isLogical(A)) {
00704             A = PROTECT(coerceVector(A, REALSXP));
00705             nprot++;
00706         }
00707         if (!isReal(A))
00708             error(_("invalid class '%s' to dup_mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix"), cl);
00709     }
00710 
00711     DUP_MMATRIX_SET_1;
00712 
00713     DUP_MMATRIX_ddense_CASES
00714 
00715     UNPROTECT(nprot);
00716     return ans;
00717 }
00718 
00719 
00720 SEXP new_dgeMatrix(int nrow, int ncol)
00721 {
00722     SEXP ans = PROTECT(NEW_OBJECT(MAKE_CLASS("dgeMatrix"))),
00723          ad = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, 2));
00724 
00725     INTEGER(ad)[0] = nrow;
00726     INTEGER(ad)[1] = ncol;
00727     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimSym, ad);
00728     SET_SLOT(ans, Matrix_DimNamesSym, allocVector(VECSXP, 2));
00729     ALLOC_SLOT(ans, Matrix_xSym, REALSXP, nrow * ncol);
00730 
00731     UNPROTECT(2);
00732     return ans;
00733 }
00734 
00744 SEXP m_encodeInd(SEXP ij, SEXP di)
00745 {
00746     SEXP ans;
00747     int *ij_di = INTEGER(getAttrib(ij, R_DimSymbol)), n = ij_di[0];
00748     int *Di = INTEGER(di), *IJ = INTEGER(ij);
00749 
00750     if(!(isMatrix(ij) && isInteger(ij) && ij_di[1] == 2))
00751         error(_("Argument ij must be 2-column integer matrix"));
00752 
00753     if((Di[0] * (double) Di[1]) >= 1 + (double)INT_MAX) { /* need double */
00754         ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
00755         double *ii = REAL(ans), nr = (double) Di[0];
00756         int i, *j_ = IJ+n;
00757         for(i=0; i < n; i++) ii[i] = IJ[i] + j_[i] * nr;
00758     } else {
00759         ans = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, n));
00760         int *ii = INTEGER(ans), nr = Di[0];
00761         int i, *j_ = IJ+n;
00762         for(i=0; i < n; i++) ii[i] = IJ[i] + j_[i] * nr;
00763     }
00764     UNPROTECT(1);
00765     return ans;
00766 }
00767 
00778 SEXP m_encodeInd2(SEXP i, SEXP j, SEXP di)
00779 {
00780     SEXP ans;
00781     int n = LENGTH(i);
00782     int *Di = INTEGER(di), *i_ = INTEGER(i), *j_ = INTEGER(j);
00783 
00784     if(LENGTH(j) != n || !isInteger(i) || !isInteger(j))
00785         error(_("i and j must be integer vectors of the same length"));
00786 
00787     if((Di[0] * (double) Di[1]) >= 1 + (double)INT_MAX) { /* need double */
00788         ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, n));
00789         double *ii = REAL(ans), nr = (double) Di[0];
00790         int i;
00791         for(i=0; i < n; i++) ii[i] = i_[i] + j_[i] * nr;
00792     } else {
00793         ans = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, n));
00794         int *ii = INTEGER(ans), nr = Di[0];
00795         int i;
00796         for(i=0; i < n; i++) ii[i] = i_[i] + j_[i] * nr;
00797     }
00798     UNPROTECT(1);
00799     return ans;
00800 }
